title: Are there any good Italian restaurants in Cary?
author: Michael Phillips
body: My wife and I were looking to grab a bite at a nice restaurant while we were visiting the lovely MetLife Tech HQ in Cary, NC.

replies.reply: None that I can think of.
replies.author: Alan Chen

title: Does anyone know how to rename multiple columns in SQL?
author: Michael Phillips
body:
I am working on an SQL-heavy project for my team.

I can do it column-by-column but am unsure of how it's done with more than one. Can someone help? Thanks!
